name: elm-monocle
description: Library providing purely functional abstractions to manipulate records

scripts.compile-and-watch: echo 'Compiling elm-monocle ...' && npm run compile && onchange './src/**/*.elm' -v -- npm run compile
scripts.test-and-watch: echo 'Testing elm-monocle ...' && npm test && onchange '**/*.elm' -v -- npm test

author: Artur Opala
